import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { Button } from '../'; import beautifulStories from '../../images/home/desktop/beautiful-stories.jpg'; import everyone from '../../images/home/desktop/designed-for-everyone.jpg'; import arrow from '../../images/shared/desktop/arrow.svg'; const StoriesPageRedirectCTA = () => (

Beautiful stories every time

We provide design templates to ensure your stories look terrific. Easily add photos, text, embed maps and media from other networks. Then share your story with everyone.

Designed for everyone

Photosnap can help you create stories that resonate with your audience. Our tool is designed for photographers of all levels, brands, businesses you name it.

) export default StoriesPageRedirectCTA;
